name: The Playroom (itch)
description:
You play as Alice as she traverses the mysterious world of The Playroom! Use the viewport itself to help solve puzzles and move around the world in order to escape this childish nightmare. Beware the Butterfly!

Made for Side Quest #4 - Room.

Controls

A & D to move Left and Right

W & S to ascend/descend the Candy Canes

E to Interact

Spacebar to Jump/Skip chatbox

Z & X to manually rotate the Viewport Wheels

R to Reset current room

Credits

Design - Pablo Granado Valdivielso & Craig Brown

Art - Claire Langton-Goh

Programmer - Oana Furtuna
